root.name: Flagman
root.description: GameplayFlagman plays very much like "Simon Says", Mr. Game and Watch will show flags in a certain order and it is up to the player to show him the flags once he is done in the order he showed them to the player. Every time the player shows the flags in the correct order Mr games and Watch will display an extra flag making the "code" longer and harder to remember as the game goes on. DSi Virtual Console Pricing Japan: 200 Points
